DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effect of MK0524A (niacin (+) laropiprant) on lowering bad cholesterol and raising good cholesterol.
DOC.brief_title: Extended Release (ER) Niacin/Laropiprant Add on Study (0524A-082)
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years of age or older and on a stable dose of lipid therapy Patients lipid level is outside the recommended range Patients that are HIV positive
